item.title: A geological feature called the 'Double Arch' in southern Utah has collapsed
item.description: National Park Service officials said harsh weather, including wind and rain, have led to erosion and spalling, which occurs when fragments of stone chip or break off.

item.title: Leaders of France, Germany and Britain endorse calls for cease-fire in Gaza
item.description: In a joint statement released Monday, the British, French and German leaders endorsed the latest push by the U.S., Qatar and Egypt to broker an agreement to end the 10-month-old Israel-Hamas war.
